statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_spent FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE total_clicks < 100 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE total_clicks > 200;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_spent FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE total_conversions = 0;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE total_clicks >= 100 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_spent FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_spent ASC
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE total_conversions > 5 AND total_clicks < 500 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC, start_date ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE total_clicks > 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks FROM campaign_metrics;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, conversion_rate FROM campaign_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversion_rate FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, ROI FROM campaign_metrics, campaign_roi WHERE campaign_metrics.campaign_id = campaign_roi.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversion_rate FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY clicks DESC, impressions ASC

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, clicks, total_revenue, total_costs, roi FROM campaign_metrics JOIN campaign_roi ON campaign_metrics.campaign_id = campaign_roi.campaign_id WHERE total_revenue > total_costs ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversion_rate FROM campaign_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions < 500 ORDER BY impressions ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, clicks, total_revenue, roi FROM campaign_metrics LEFT JOIN campaign_roi ON campaign_metrics.campaign_id = campaign_roi.campaign_id WHERE total_revenue < 10000
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversion_rate FROM campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY campaign_id
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT ad_title, ad_content, clicks FROM ads WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM ad_groups GROUP BY ad_group_name;
SELECT ad_id, ad_group_id, ad_title FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'Display Ad' ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT ad_title, ad_type FROM ads WHERE ad_group_id = 3 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name,  SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_groups GROUP BY ad_group_name HAVING total_clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, roi FROM campaigns JOIN ad_groups ON campaigns.campaign_id = ad_groups.campaign_id WHERE ad_group_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type, clicks, impressions FROM Ads ORDER BY impressions DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT adgroup_id, adgroup_name, budget FROM AdGroups WHERE priority > 3 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT metrics.date, metrics.cost, metrics.revenue, COUNT(metrics.ad_id) AS total_ads FROM Metrics WHERE cost > 500 GROUP BY metrics.date;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 1000
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, clicks, impressions FROM Ads WHERE ad_type = 'banner' ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, clicks, impressions FROM Ads WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, cost, revenue, conversions FROM Ads JOIN Metrics ON Ads.ad_id = Metrics.ad_id WHERE cost < 500 AND revenue > 1000
SELECT * FROM campaign_results;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks FROM campaign_results;
SELECT campaign_id, revenue FROM campaign_results WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT segment_name, demographics FROM audience_segment WHERE segment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT segment_name, demographics FROM audience_segment WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM marketing_channel;
SELECT campaign_id, date, impressions, clicks, cost FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = 4 AND date > '2022-01-01';
